entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -28.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 02:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -28.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -31.6°C
Wind: E 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then clearing. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
